main.name: Rich Jiang
main.description: I have skills with web development using React JS and Machine Learning using Keras. My best languages are JavaScript,Python, and Java
main.bio: Hi, my name is Rich Jiang and I am a software engineer with a skillset in machine learning. I love solving problems on a high level both in both software projects and businesses.
main.contactmessage: Reach out to me though my email at rich.jiang2@gmail.com

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Here is where I got my first exposure to machine learning and experience in being an entrepreneur. While in school I started two businesses with the Blackstone Launchpad.

work.title: Machine Learning Researcher
work.description: I founded a reaseach topic to preditc future stock prices by applying sentiment based machine learning on Twitter data. This mostly involved cleaning and creating datasets to feed my model. Day to day I worked with packages libraries like Pandas, NLTK, and Keras.

work.title: Analytical Intern
work.description: Here I got my first exposure to Wall Street. I performed financial analysis on different public companies based in tech to provide information to my supervisor. I also communicated with thousands of high-net worth individuals resulting in a 10% increase in new investors. I prepared brief reports identifying identifying areas of oppertunity for customers to invest in.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels
